DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study determine rate healthy surgical margin tumor resection transoral robot-assisted surgery glottic and/or supraglottic early stage ( T1-T2 ) laryngeal cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Surgical Treatment Early Stage Glotto-supraglottic Laryngeal Cancer Via Transoral Resection With Robotic Assistance
DOC.criteria: The subject sign consent The subject must member beneficiary health insurance plan The patient available 12 month followup The subject cancer larynx : classified T1 T2 TNM glottic localization / supraglottic regardless node status without history head neck cancer The subject distant metastasis ( M0 ) A decision endoscopic robotassisted surgery retain multidisciplinary meeting
